Title: 185: The Pre-Requisites for Analytics to Happen
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the President of McKnight Consulting Group, William McKnight. You will learn about the right pre-requisites to have the right analytics organization, learn the 4 components of data maturity of an organization, and also find out the 5 different stages of which level an organization can be.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/185
